title: Portland Cement Stocks for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1911-1937 (2)--Original Data, 1938-1957 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1911-1940. Figures Refer To Finished Portland Cement. The Units Are Barrels Of 376 Pounds Net Or 380 Gross Pounds (See Scb, September 1923, P. 47; The Scb 1932 Annual Supplement And Successive Issues.) Source: U.S. Department Of Commerce, Survey Of Current Business, Statistical Supplements, And The U.S. Bureau Of Mines, Mineral Industry Surveys

This NBER data series m05026b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 5 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter05.html.

NBER Indicator: m05026b
